DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare acute hematotoxicity infection rate daily weekly administration cladribine patient hairy cell leukemia . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive daily subcutaneous bolus injection cladribine ( 2-CDA ) 5 day ( standard dose ) . - Arm II : Patients receive weekly subcutaneous bolus injection 2-CDA 5 week . Patients show complete partial remission evaluation day 71 first treatment course receive treatment relapse disease progression evident . Patients show minor response day 71 first treatment course receive subsequent course standard dose 2-CDA . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 120 patient accrue study within 4 year .
